summary: La película del detective Pikachu revela un nuevo video, la característica detrás de las escenas #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi...
title: La película del detective Pikachu revela un nuevo video, la característica detrás de las escenas #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias #LiveAction #DetectivePikachu
body:
La película se estrena en Estados Unidos el 10 de mayo.

El actor Ryan Reynolds ‘ YouTube canal comenzó la transmisión de un video de Legendary Entertainment y Warner Bros. ‘ de acción en vivo Pokemon: Pikachu detective de cine el 22 de abril El video, titulado “Un qué mundo Pikachu”, destaca el carácter detective Pikachu. Warner Bros. UK también comenzó a transmitir un video tras bambalinas…

View On WordPress

summary: Like I can’t even comprehend the power of the Detective Pikachu trailer. Like no other movie since the masterpiece of Shrek 2...
body: Like I can’t even comprehend the power of the Detective Pikachu trailer. Like no other movie since the masterpiece of Shrek 2 has used “I Need a Hero” and yet I’m not even mad?? Like if it wasn’t Ryan Reynolds playing Pikachu they never could’ve made it work. Like I get pumped to see the trailer in the theaters. I’m gonna be sad when that trailer isn’t playing in theaters anymore

summary: So, apparently Avengers Endgame already passed a billion dollars at the worldwide box office. Am I the only one worried that...
question: So, apparently Avengers Endgame already passed a billion dollars at the worldwide box office. Am I the only one worried that between this movie and Godzilla and Aladdin coming up so soon, Detective Pikachu might not actually make all that much even if it does turn a profit? Like, I want this film to be a hit so bad, but this seems like a bad time to release it.
answer:
You shouldn’t worry because here’s the thing.

It’s Pokemon.

Pokemon is one of the biggest phenomena of all time. I remember when Pokemon came out over in America. I was in 3rd or 4th grade. Once the show hit, it exploded. There was tons of Pokemon theme food, kids were bringing the card game to school and there was even a Pokemon theater show.

I’m not kidding.

For about 20 years, Pokemon has managed to stay popular. Most franchises can’t brag about that. There have been who have tried so hard to recapture that magic but they can’t. So many ripoffs yet none of them have come close to Pokemon’s popularity.

There is no way Detective Pikachu could not be a hit. It has it’s fanbase built in. I know China is going to be all over this and I know tons of adults who are more excited about this than Endgame.

This movie will do amazingly.
